mapper.update:
update nns_house
house_code = #{houseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plot_id = #{plotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
plot_name = #{plotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_no = #{unitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
house_no = #{houseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
area = #{area,jdbcType=REAL},
room = #{room,jdbcType=TINYINT},
hall = #{hall,jdbcType=TINYINT},
bathroom = #{bathroom,jdbcType=TINYINT},
kitchen = #{kitchen,jdbcType=TINYINT},
floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_floor = #{totalFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
house_type = #{houseType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
price_type = #{priceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=BIGINT},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
audti_log = #{audtiLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_time = now(), version = version+1
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update nns_house set house_code = #{houseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plot_id = #{plotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, plot_name = #{plotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_no = #{unitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_no = #{houseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, area = #{area,jdbcType=REAL}, room = #{room,jdbcType=TINYINT}, hall = #{hall,jdbcType=TINYINT}, bathroom = #{bathroom,jdbcType=TINYINT}, kitchen = #{kitchen,jdbcType=TINYINT}, floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_floor = #{totalFloor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_type = #{houseType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, price_type = #{priceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, audti_log = #{audtiLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_time = now(), version = version+1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select bt.id as id, bt.tag_name as name, bt.tag_color as color from nns_house_tag_rel htr left join base_tag bt on htr.tag_id = bt.id where htr.nns_house_id = #{id}

select nh.id as id, nh.house_code as house_code, nh.longitude as longitude, nh.latitude as latitude, nh.address as address, nh.plot_id as plot_id, nh.plot_name as plot_name, nh.unit_no as unit_no, nh.house_no as house_no, nh.district_id as district_id, bd.district_name as districtName, nh.block_id as block_id, bb.block_name as blockName, nh.area as area, nh.room as room, nh.hall as hall, nh.bathroom as bathroom, nh.kitchen as kitchen, nh.floor as floor, nh.total_floor as total_floor, nh.house_type as house_type, nh.price_type as price_type, nh.total_price as total_price, nh.audit_time as audit_time, nh.auditor as auditor, nh.audit_status as audit_status, nh.audti_log as audti_log, nh.status as status, nh.is_delete as is_delete from nns_house nh left join base_district bd on nh.district_id = bd.id left join base_block bb on nh.block_id = bb.id where nh.id = #{id} and nh.is_delete = 0
